member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.UnableToConnect
member.summary: The server is unable to connect.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.ConnectionRefused
member.summary: Connection refused or inability to open an SMTP stream.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.SystemMessage
member.summary: System status message or help reply.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.HelpResponse
member.summary: A response to the HELP command.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.ServiceReady
member.summary: The service is ready.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.ServiceClosingTransmissionChannel
member.summary: Goodbye.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.AuthenticationSuccessful
member.summary: Authentication was Successful.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.Ok
member.summary: Everything was Ok.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.RelayToAnotherServer
member.summary: "User not local will forward": the recipients account is not on the present server, so it will be relayed to another.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.CantVerifyUser
member.summary: The server cannot verify the user, but it will try to deliver the message anyway.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.ContinueWithAuth
member.summary: Continue with the authentication.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.StartMailInput
member.summary: Start the mail input.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.TimeoutConnectionProblem
member.summary: "Timeout connection problem": there have been issues during the message transfer.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.ServiceUnavailable
member.summary: The service is unavailable due to a connection problem: it may refer to an exceeded limit of simultaneous connections, or a more general temporary problem. The server (yours or the recipient's) is not available at the moment, so the dispatch will be tried again later.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.ExceededStorage
member.summary: The recipients mailbox has exceeded its storage limit.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.Overloaded
member.summary: Not enough space on the disk, or an "out of memory" condition due to a file overload.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.RecipientNotResponding
member.summary: The recipients server is not responding.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.ConnectionDropped
member.summary: The connection was dropped during the transmission.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.MaxHopCountExceeded
member.summary: The maximum hop count was exceeded for the message: an internal loop has occurred.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.MessageTimeout
member.summary: Your outgoing message timed out because of issues concerning the incoming server.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.RoutingError
member.summary: A routing error.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.Unavailable
member.summary: "Requested action not taken The users mailbox is unavailable". The mailbox has been corrupted or placed on an offline server, or your email hasn't been accepted for IP problems or blacklisting.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.Aborted
member.summary: "Requested action aborted Local error in processing". Your ISP's server or the server that got a first relay from yours has encountered a connection problem.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.InsufficientStorage
member.summary: There is insufficent stored to handle the mail.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.ClientNotPermitted
member.summary: The client is not permitted to connect.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.Error
member.summary: An error of your mail server, often due to an issue of the local anti-spam filter.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.CommandUnrecognized
member.summary: Syntax error, command unrecognized (This may include errors such as command line too long).

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.SyntaxError
member.summary: Syntax error in parameters or arguments.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.CommandNotImplemented
member.summary: The command has not been implemented.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.BadSequence
member.summary: Bad sequence of commands.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.CommandParameterNotImplemented
member.summary: A command parameter is not implemented.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.BadEmailAddress
member.summary: Bad email address. Codes 510 or 511 result the same structure. One of the addresses in your TO, CC or BBC line doesn't exist. Check again your recipients' accounts and correct any possible misspelling.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.DnsError
member.summary: A DNS error: the host server for the recipient's domain name cannot be found.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.IncorrectAddressType
member.summary: "Address type is incorrect": another problem concerning address misspelling. In few cases, however, it's related to an authentication issue.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.MailingLimitExceeded
member.summary: The total size of your mailing exceeds the recipient server's limits.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.AuthenticationRequired
member.summary: Authentication required

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.AuthenticationFailed
member.summary: Authentication failed.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.RecipientAddressRejected
member.summary: The recipient address rejected your message: normally, it's an error caused by an anti-spam filter.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.MailboxUnavailable
member.summary: The Mailbox is temporarily unavailable.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.RelayDenied
member.summary: "User not local or invalid address Relay denied". Meaning, if both your address and the recipients are not locally hosted by the server, a relay can be interrupted.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.SizeLimitExceeded
member.summary: The size limit has been exceeded.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.MailboxNameNotAllowed
member.summary: The Mailbox is permanently not available.

member.name: F:SmtpServer.Protocol.SmtpReplyCode.TransactionFailed
member.summary: The transaction failed.
